title: 'Very Matte Very Dark'
body: Love love love this product! Very Matte and dark and perfe t for smokey eyes. But for the amount paid, quantity is quite poor. Nonetheless, I'd buy it again.

title: 'Great eyeliner for the price'
body: Pros: - budget friendly - colorbar is a safe brand - easily available - felt tip - great for precise wings - definitely beginner friendly - semi-matte - lasts about 2-3 hours in matte finish, then turns kinda glossy  Cons: - lasts for not too long - is not smudge proof, resistant, sure - has fallout after 3 hours - felt tip sometimes is messed up in the bottle itself  I am on my second bottle so I recommend it however, I'd rather get a Sugar one or a gel kohl simply because they last longer and don't move around as much as this does.
